kapa kirime uthsawayata arayuma 16 awasan kota, dan apa dewa maligawe pawithra wime mangalyaya pawathwimata sudanam bawin oba da ema mangalya dinayan pawathwana lesa illa oba wetha liya ewannemu. 17 swakiya senanga mulumanin ma midu dewiyan wahanse wyawasthawa mangin porondu wu lesa siyallan matha siya urumaya da rajyaya da pujakawaraya da shuddhawanthakama da danaya karamin, un wahanse thula apage balaporoththuwa thabana paridi un wahanse apa hata sabawin ma kadinamin dayawa penwana seka. 18 elesa dayawa penwa maha napuren apa muda dewa maligawa pawithra kota athi bawin un wahanse mihi pita hama thanin ma athishuddhasthanayata apa ekathu karana seka.

ee siddiyen passe siddhawemin thibunu godak dewal nawathuna;game minissunta nidahase husma ganna puluwan widiyata.eeth ee tika kalayayi.samahara dawaswala pandarajame gamsabhapara dige awidagena yana ayata karakoppuwa hariyedi anga salitha wena amuthu deyak dakinna puluwan wuna.ee de dakapu godak dena barapathala widiyata asanipa wuna.samahara ayage sihi kalpanawath aduwuna.

skin keyar rutin ekakadi amathaka karannama bari deyak thamayi dinapatha ema katayuthu pawathwagena yama.ketiyenma kiyanawa nam oya mona hari sathkarayak oyage muhuna,anga wenuwen karanawanam,eeka mathak wena welawata witharak karanne nathuwa hamadama kalasatahanakata anuwa sidukarana eka.eeka ude-ra kiyana kalawaladi bedagena sidu karanna puluwan.niyamitha paridi wathura panaya kirima,nisi thethamanaya labaganima,sedim katayuthu,athirili maru kirima wagema dahadiya sahitha andum iwathkirima wage katayuthu dinapatha nisi kalasatahanakata anuwa karanna puluwan nam,kurula wadayen midila nirogi samak labaganna rasnaya-sithala, me oonima kalaguna thathwayakadi puluwan.
